trans-unit.source: Represents a secure client session for user activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者啟動、 授權繫結及其他權限管理作業的安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, SecureEnvironment is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 如同其他<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>型別，SecureEnvironment 才可用於完全信任應用程式。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the ApplicationManifest specified when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Secretscertificate 時指定<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>所建立。

trans-unit.source: The application manifest specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*> method when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> is created.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的應用程式資訊清單<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>方法時<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>建立。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session for a specified user with a given rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的權限資訊清單建立指定之使用者的安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: This Create method is intended for use with users that are already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此 Create 方法僅供與已啟用的使用者使用例如<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>從傳回的清單中提供

trans-unit.source: Use the alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method for users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 使用替代<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法尚未啟動的使用者。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式權限資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 管理內容的使用者群組授與存取權的權限。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 啟動、 授權繫結及其他權限管理作業的安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session given an application rights manifest, <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全的用戶端工作階段指定的應用程式權限資訊清單中， <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This Create method is intended for new users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 此 Create 方法僅供尚未啟動的新使用者。

trans-unit.source: Activating a new user includes a roundtrip server transaction to obtain the User Certificate and Client License Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 啟動新的使用者包括來回伺服器的交易，以取得使用者憑證和用戶端授權憑證。

trans-unit.source: The alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method can be used if a user is already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>可以使用方法，如果已啟用使用者，例如<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>從傳回的清單中所提供</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>的替代

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式權限資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: The method of authentication.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the user rights account certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用者權限帳戶憑證的類型。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 啟動、 授權繫結及其他權限管理作業的安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The application should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該呼叫 Dispose 完成<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: After Dispose is called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> are reclaimed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 之後，資源配置給<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>記憶體回收行程會回收。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> is released.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之前的最後一個參考<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>釋放。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the instance's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果未呼叫 Dispose，資源配置給<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>將不會釋放記憶體回收行程呼叫的執行個體之前<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>與受保護的 Dispose 方法會叫用`disposing`參數設定為`true`。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>參考。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the activated users.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已啟動的使用者清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of the currently activated users.
trans-unit.target: 目前已啟動的使用者清單。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的使用者是否已經啟動的存取權限管理的內容。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 管理內容的使用者群組授與存取權的權限。

trans-unit.source: if the given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果給定 user 已啟用存取權限管理內容，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Removes the license activation for a specified user.
trans-unit.target: 移除授權啟用指定的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The user authentication must be performed either with Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 驗證或 Passport 驗證，則必須執行使用者驗證。

trans-unit.source: The user to remove the license activation for.
trans-unit.target: 要移除授權啟動的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The user parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The user parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The given user is not authenticated with either Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 指定 user 也尚未經過驗證與 Windows 驗證或 Passport 驗證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or user-group specified when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者群組時，指定<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>所建立。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*> method when the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: 使用者群組指定為<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>方法時<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment"></xref>所建立。</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create*>
